Chapter 4 Missing values 4.1 Checking for Missing Values of stocks of Apple and Pfizer

Chapter 4 Missing values 4.0.1 Visualizing missing data points Our project, the analysis of stock market data gathers data files from Bloomberg and Yahoo Finance. These are parts of highly processed and regularly maintained financial data on which thousands of peopleâ€™s personal financing decisions rely. Therefore, there are no missing values found on these data sets. In the first section, I will use some historic stock data and run the missing plots function to check if there is any missing data. # Import the missing data function to this file for creating the plots source("missing_data_function.R") 4.1 Checking for Missing Values of stocks of Apple and Pfizer For the analysis below, we imported 3 years of stock data for AAPL and PFE. data_aapl <- getSymbols("AAPL", src="yahoo", from="2018-03-01", to="2021-10-31", auto.assign=FALSE) df_aapl = data.frame(date = index(data_aapl), data_aapl, row.names=NULL) head(df_aapl) ## date AAPL.Open AAPL.High AAPL.Low AAPL.Close AAPL.Volume AAPL.Adjusted ## 1 2018-03-01 44.6350 44.9450 43.1650 43.7500 195208000 42.01391 ## 2 2018-03-02 43.2000 44.0750 43.1125 44.0525 153816000 42.30441 ## 3 2018-03-05 43.8025 44.4350 43.6300 44.2050 113605600 42.45086 ## 4 2018-03-06 44.4775 44.5625 44.0325 44.1675 95154000 42.41484 ## 5 2018-03-07 43.7350 43.9625 43.5675 43.7575 126814000 42.02111 ## 6 2018-03-08 43.8700 44.2800 43.7675 44.2350 95096400 42.47967 data_pfe <- getSymbols("PFE", src="yahoo", from="2018-03-01", to="2021-10-31", auto.assign=FALSE) df_pfe = data.frame(date = index(data_pfe), data_pfe, row.names=NULL) head(df_pfe) ## date PFE.Open PFE.High PFE.Low PFE.Close PFE.Volume PFE.Adjusted ## 1 2018-03-01 34.26945 34.41177 33.39658 33.80455 30282896 29.36609 ## 2 2018-03-02 33.72865 34.22201 33.58634 34.10816 22271336 29.62983 ## 3 2018-03-05 33.98482 34.42125 33.93738 34.26945 22319609 29.76994 ## 4 2018-03-06 34.38330 34.38330 33.91841 34.04174 18003479 29.57214 ## 5 2018-03-07 33.77609 34.23150 33.72865 34.08918 23440328 29.61335 ## 6 2018-03-08 34.14611 34.62998 34.08918 34.62998 21646630 30.08314 missing_data_function(data_aapl) missing_data_function(data_pfe) The output from these plots show us that the data we will be using for our analysis does not contain any missing values.
